DOC.detailed_description: Forty primary caregiver overweight child youth attend Pediatric Centre Weight Health ( Edmonton , AB ) recruit . Participants randomly assign one two group ( 2D PSMAs versus 3D PSMAs ) . After brief explanation respective tool , participant estimate volume pre-measured rubber food portion model test plate . Participants give 2D 3D PSMAs take home use real-world . After 2-4 week , participant telephone research team complete brief survey evaluate usefulness satisfaction 2D 3D PSMAs home .
